points: Built by ex-Morning Brew team; launched Oct 2021 in NYC.
Now ~20k newsletters send 1B emails per month; customers include Boston Globe Media and Brex.
Email remains a 5B-user channel, making owned newsletters a sticky distribution play.
Founders ran Morning Brew’s growth stack and saw email as the most lucrative owned channel.
Existing tools lacked built-in growth/monetization features they used internally (referrals, ads).
Post-Morning Brew they shipped beehiiv in Oct 2021 with referral programs and paywalls packaged as a product.
Started with free/$42/$84 tiers to attract early creators needing growth tooling.
Jun 2023: 7,500 active newsletters, 35M readers, 350M monthly impressions; profitable monthly pre-Series A.
Apr 2024: scaled to ~20k active newsletters, 1B monthly emails, $1.2M customer revenue per month, Series B $33M.
Logos like Boston Globe Media, Brex, and Arnold Schwarzenegger’s newsletter show mixed creator/enterprise fit.
Unlimited email sends across tiers with up to 100k subscribers on Scale/Max.
Built-in referral program, Boosts, and programmatic ad network; migration API to switch from other ESPs.
Ex-Morning Brew team productized their growth stack and scaled to 1B emails/month in three years.
Paid part will show how to pick a plan, set up growth tools, and when beehiiv beats Substack/ConvertKit/Mailchimp.
Choose Launch ($0, 2.5k subs), Scale ($43/mo, 100k subs), or Max ($96/mo, 100k subs) based on list size and seats.
Enable referral program/Boosts from day 1; keep unlimited sends to test cadence without cost spikes.
Use web builder + custom domains to host archives and capture subscribers beyond email embeds.
Media-style newsletters (Boston Globe Mediaなどの顧客) can pair content with beehiiv’s ad network for revenue.
Referral programsとRecommendationsが標準搭載で、Morning Brew式の成長ループを再現できる設計。
API・IntegrationsとUnlimited sendsにより、Brexのような企業顧客も既存CRMと併用できる余地がある。
Substack: paidサブスク機能が中心。beehiivは広告ネットワークと成長機能を強調。
ConvertKit: オートメーションに強い。beehiivはリファラル/Boostsと無制限送信で差別化。
Mailchimp: 総合マーケツール。beehiivはニュースレター特化でシンプルな価格体系。
Model payback using plan prices vs. ad/boost revenue; $43 Scale breaks even with minimal CPM/ads or low-volume sponsorships.
Subscriber limits (2.5k vs 100k) and seat counts (1 vs 3 vs unlimited) dictate when to upgrade.
Migration API lowers switching cost; factor in saved ESP overage fees from unlimited sends.
Checklist: pick plan by list size, enable referrals/ads, set cadence using unlimited sends, compare fee models to rivals.
When beehiiv wins: growth loops and monetization baked in; when rivals win: deeper automation (ConvertKit/Mailchimp) or built-in paid-sub stack (Substack).
